import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import NewsCard from'../components/NewsCard';import'./HomePage.css';// We will create this CSS file next
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomePage=()=>{const[news,setNews]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchNews=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const response=await fetch('/api/news');if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const data=await response.json();setNews(data);}catch(error){setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchNews();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"home-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"UFC Insight"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Latest News from UFC.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"news-container",children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading news..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error fetching news: ",error]}),!loading&&!error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-grid",children:news.map((article,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewsCard,{article:article},index))})]})]});};export default HomePage;
